```{r}
#################################
#                               #
#                               #
#       Black Noise H=4/5       #
#                               #
#                               #
#################################
# H=3/4
I=0#Initial point
F=1#Final point
H<-4/5
sig<-1
N<-7
dt<-(F-I)/N
t<-seq(I,F,length=N)#Domain
C<-matrix(0,N-1,N-1)
for (i in 2:N) {
  for (j in 2:N) {
   C[i-1,j-1] <- (1/2)*((abs(t[i])^(2*H) + abs(t[j])^(2*H) - abs(t[i]-t[j])^(2*H)))
  }
}
C[1:5,1:5]
```
```{r}
z<-rnorm(N-1)
L<- 2*log(prod(dnorm(chol(C)%*%z))/prod(dnorm(z)))
L
```

prod(L>=0)
